skills.description: (You must place the top 2 cards of your deck in your Drop Area to activate this skill.) When this card attacks, draw 1 card.
When your life is at 4 or less : You may choose up to 2 of your energy, switch them to Active Mode, and flip this card over.
(This skill takes effect when you have 5 or more cards in your Drop Area.) When this card attacks, draw 1 card, and this card gains <CRITICAL> for the duration of the turn.
Choose 1 red Battle Card in your Battle Area : The chosen Battle Card can attack Battle Cards in Active Mode for the duration of the turn.

When one of your Battle Cards attacks, it gets +5000 power for the duration of the turn, then choose up to 1 <DRAGON BALL> card from your deck or life and add it to your hand. Then shuffle any areas you looked through.
When there are 7 <DRAGON BALL> cards in your Drop Area : Choose up to 1 ≪Desire≫ card in your Drop Area, add it to your hand, and flip this card over.
Choose one-
・Draw 1 card.
・Choose 1 red or black ≪Desire≫ card in your hand with an energy cost less than or equal to your current energy and activate its <ACTIVATE MAIN> skill.

・Remove 7 <DRAGON BALL> cards in your Drop Area from the game. If you do, draw 3 cards, choose 1 of your Battle Cards and it gets +15000 power for the duration of the turn, then flip this card over at the end of the turn.
()()：Red {Son Goku} with an energy cost of 1.
(You must place the top 3 cards of your deck in your Drop Area to activate this skill.) Choose 1 of your red Battle Cards and KO it : Switch this card to Active Mode.
(This card can't be chosen by the skills of your opponent's cards.)

When you combo with this card from the Battle Area, choose up to 1 red {Son Goku} with an energy cost of 1 from your deck, play it, and shuffle your deck. If you played a card using this skill, draw 1 card.

Choose this card, along with a 〈Bandages〉 card and 〈Spike〉 card from your Drop Area, and place them at the bottom of their owners' decks : Choose up to 1 {Grandpa Gohan} from your deck or Drop Area and play it, then choose that card, and it gets +5000 power and <DOUBLE STRIKE> for the duration of the turn. Then shuffle your deck if you looked through it.
(You can only include up to 4 cards with <SUPER COMBO> in your deck.)
When you combo with this card, if your Leader Card is red and your life is at 4 or less, draw 1 card.

(You must place the top 5 cards of your deck in your Drop Area to activate this skill.) If your Leader Card is a red 《Earthling》 card, for the duration of the turn, this card gets +6000 power, can't have its attack negated, and deals 2 damage to your opponent's life when it KOs an opponent's Battle Card.

(You must place the top 5 cards of your deck in your Drop Area to activate this skill.) If your Leader Card is a red 《Earthling》 card, for the duration of the turn, this card gets +6000 power, can't have its attack negated, and deals 2 damage to your opponent's life when it KOs an opponent's Battle Card.
During your opponent's turn, if your Leader Card is red and this card is in Rest Mode, your opponent's cards can't attack Leader Cards, and this card gets -5000 power.
(You can only include up to 4 cards with <SUPER COMBO> in your deck.)
(This skill takes effect when you have 5 or more cards in your Drop Area.) When you combo with this card, if your Leader Card is red, draw 1 card.

When you combo with this card from the Battle Area, you may add 1 card from your life to your hand. If you do, choose up to 1 red {Yamcha} with an energy cost of 2 from your deck, play it, and shuffle your deck.
When you play this card, if your Leader Card is a 《Shenron》 card and {Oolong's Wish} is in your Drop Area, draw 2 cards.
When this card is KO'd, choose up to 1 each of {Pilaf, Leader of the Crew}, {Shu, Trusted Lackey}, and {Mai, Trusted Lackey} from your Drop Area and play them.

Choose this card and 1 each of {Shu, Trusted Lackey} and {Mai, Trusted Lackey} from your Battle Area and place them in your Drop Area : Choose up to 1 {Combiner Mecha Pilaf Machine} from your deck or Drop Area and play it. Then shuffle your deck if you looked through it.

Choose 1 <DRAGON BALL> card from your deck, place it in your Drop Area, then shuffle your deck : Choose 1 {Shu, Trusted Lackey} and 1 {Mai, Trusted Lackey} in your Battle Area, and they get +5000 power for the duration of the turn.
|ONE| : Choose up to 1 {Mai, Trusted Lackey} from your deck, play it, then shuffle your deck.
When you play this card, choose up to 1 <DRAGON BALL> card from your deck and add it to your hand, then shuffle your deck.
(When one of your other cards is attacked, you may switch this card to Rest Mode and change the target of the attack to this card.)
When this card is KO'd, choose up to 1 〈Spike〉 card from your Drop Area and play it in Rest Mode.
When this card attacks, it gets +9000 power for the duration of the turn.
When this card is KO'd, choose up to 1 〈Son Gohan〉 card from your Drop Area and play it in Rest Mode.

When you play this card, choose up to 1 〈Bandages〉, 〈Spike〉, or 〈Son Gohan〉 card from your deck and place it in your Drop Area, shuffle your deck, then choose up to 1 〈Bandages〉 card from your Drop Area and play it.
If {A King's Return to Youth} is in your Drop Area, reduce the energy cost of this card in your hand by 1.

(This skill takes effect when you have 10 or more cards in your Drop Area.) Choose 1 {King Piccolo, Terror Unleashed} or {A King's Return to Youth} from your Drop Area and send it to your Warp : If your Leader Card is a red 《Shenron》 card, switch this card to Active Mode.
If {A King's Return to Youth} is in your Drop Area, reduce the energy cost of this card in your hand by 1.

(This skill takes effect when you have 10 or more cards in your Drop Area.) Choose 1 {King Piccolo, Terror Unleashed} or {A King's Return to Youth} from your Drop Area and send it to your Warp : If your Leader Card is a red 《Shenron》 card, switch this card to Active Mode.

Your Leader Card is red : Choose up to 1 of your cards and it gets +40000 power for the duration of the battle, then choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and it gets -10000 power for the duration of the turn.

(This skill takes effect when you have 5 or more cards in your Drop Area.) You can activate this card's <COUNTER> skill from your hand by adding a card from your life to your hand instead of paying its energy cost.

Your Leader Card is red : Choose up to 1 of your cards and it gets +40000 power for the duration of the battle, then choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and it gets -10000 power for the duration of the turn.

(This skill takes effect when you have 5 or more cards in your Drop Area.) You can activate this card's <COUNTER> skill from your hand by adding a card from your life to your hand instead of paying its energy cost.
This card gains 《Desire》 in all areas.
Your Leader Card is 《Shenron》 card : Draw 1 card, then choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and it gets -5000 power for the duration of the turn.
This card gains 《Desire》 in all areas.
Your Leader Card is a red 《Shenron》 card : Choose up to 1 {King Piccolo, Terror Unleashed} and {A King's Return to Youth} from your deck and add them to your hand, then shuffle your deck.

When this card attacks, it gets +5000 power for the duration of the turn, then choose up to 1 <DRAGON BALL> card from your deck or life and add it to your hand. Then shuffle any areas you looked through.
When there are 7 <DRAGON BALL> cards in your Drop Area : Choose up to 1 ≪Desire≫ card in your Drop Area, add it to your hand, and flip this card over.
Choose one-
・Draw 1 card.
・Choose 1 blue or black ≪Desire≫ card in your hand with an energy cost less than or equal to your current energy and activate its <ACTIVATE MAIN> skill.

・Remove 7 <DRAGON BALL> cards in your Drop Area from the game. If you do, choose up to 3 of your energy and switch them to Active Mode, and this card gets +15000 power and <CRITICAL> for the duration of the turn, then flip this card over at the end of the turn.
(You must place the top 2 cards of your deck in your Drop Area to activate this skill.) When this card attacks, draw 1 card.
When your life is at 4 or less : You may choose up to 2 of your energy, switch them to Active Mode, and flip this card over.
(This skill takes effect when you have 5 or more cards in your Drop Area.) When this card attacks, draw 1 card, and this card gets +5000 power and <CRITICAL> for the duration of the turn.
Choose 1 card in your hand and place it in the Drop Area : During this turn, when your opponent activates <COUNTER PLAY> , they choose 3 cards from their hand and place them in their Drop Area.
(When one of your other cards is attacked, you may switch this card to Rest Mode and change the target of the attack to this card.)
(This card can't be chosen by the skills of your opponent's cards.)
：Blue {Super Saiyan Son Goku} with an energy cost of 2 or more.

(You must place the top 5 cards of your deck in your Drop Area to activate this skill.) When a card evolves into this card, choose 1 card in your life and place it in your Drop Area, then choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Card's with an energy cost of 2 or less ignoring <BARRIER> and place it at the bottom of its owner's deck, then choose up to 1 {Deadly Defender Vegeta} from your deck or Drop Area and play it. Then shuffle your deck if you looked through it.

When this card attacks, choose up to 1 <DRAGON BALL> card from your deck and place it in your Drop Area, then shuffle your deck. If you placed a <DRAGON BALL> card in your Drop Area, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards, return it to its owner's hand, and if that card has an original energy cost of 3 or less, switch this card to Active Mode.
(You can only include up to 4 cards with <SUPER COMBO> in your deck.)
(This skill takes effect when you have 5 or more cards in your Drop Area.) When you combo with this card, if your Leader Card is blue, draw 1 card.
At the end of your turn, return this card to its owner's hand.

：〈Son Goku〉 and 〈Vegeta〉 (Place 1 each of the specified card with the same power from your hand into your Drop Area and play this card.)

Place this card in your Drop Area : Choose up to 1 each of blue {Super Saiyan Son Goku} and {Super Saiyan Vegeta} cards with energy costs of 2 from your deck and add them to your hand. Then shuffle your deck, and if you played this card using <UNION> , draw 1 card.
|THREE| : 〈Son Goku〉 and 〈Vegeta〉

・Look at up to 7 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 〈Janemba〉 card among them, add it to your hand, then shuffle your deck.

Send this card to its owner's Warp: If your opponent has 4 or more energy and 〈Janemba〉 card isn't in play in your Battle Area, choose up to 1 〈Janemba〉 card with an energy cost of 5 from your hand and play it.
